title: The Battle Continues for Warner Brothers Discovery
description: Paul Larbey, CEO of Bango joined Matt Miller and Paul Sweeney on a special edition of Bloomberg Markets on Bloomberg TV and Radio. Paul leads the talented Bango team as they continue to innovate with industry leading technology. Bango enables content providers to reach more paying customers through global partnerships. Larbey believes Netflix spent $82.7B on Warner Bros., and with it, the right to shape what entertainment looks like for the next decade. (Source: Bloomberg)
